title: Titans, Humans, and the Beasts
description: Put yourself in their shoes: humans were slaves of titans for thousands of years while titans were disappointed by humans numerous times. Which side would you choose? Add beasts invading their lands, seven old kings and queens willing to regain their lost power, mixed breeds, family loyalty, very diverse civilizations, and a newly acquired freedom of humans and you have a recipe for disaster.
author: Cristina M. Sburlea
